bibl.bibl: Smeathman, Henry. 1781. Some account of the termites, which are found in Africa and other hot climates. In a letter from Mr. Henry Smeathman, of Clement’s Inn, to Sir Joseph Banks, Bart. P.R.S. [Read 15 February 1781.] Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London 71: 139–92.
